name: Van Rysel RoadR 100 Bike Helmet
description: Our design team created this helmet for cyclists starting to cycle on roads and who are looking for a simple, easy to adjust and well-ventilated helmet.

reviews.name: Jules
reviews.comment: saved my head, but a bit heavy

name: Triban RT 920 Gravel Bike
description: Our dedicated Riverside touring team has designed this bike for adventure bikepacking off the beaten track. A real go anywhere and confidence inspiring bike

name: Triban GRVL 520 Gravel Bike
description: We have designed and tested this gravel bike for regular rides. It will guarantee comfort and power on windy trails

reviews.name: John
reviews.comment: great bike but didn't fit me

name: Van Rysel EDR CF Gravel Bike
description: Tested and approved during races, this bike will provide great performance on the road and you'll be amazed at how versatile it is on trails.

name: Triban RC 120 Womens Gravel Bike
description: Women wanting to discover gravel biking. Easy and versatile: single chainwheel 38-11/42, flared handlebar, 23c tubeless wheels and 700x38c tubeless ready tyres.

name: Van Rysel RoadR 500 Bike Helmet
description: Our engineers have created a comfortable, lightweight, aerodynamic helmet that ventilates the cyclist's head to improve the body's thermoregulation.

name: Triban RC 520 Disc Road Bike
description: Designed for Road Cycling. Equipped with an alloy frame, carbon fork, hydro mechanical disc brakes, and 10sp Shimano 105 mixed groupset.

name: Triban Regular Womens Road Bike
description: This bike has been developed by our all-female design team and tested by numerous women. It's the perfect ally on both flat and hill rides.

reviews.name: Gina
reviews.comment: just the right amount of pink

name: Triban RC 500 Disc Brake Road Bike
description: Designed for Road Cycling. Equipped with an alloy frame, carbon fork, mechanical disc brakes, and 9sp Shimano Sora mixed groupset.

name: Van Rysel RCR 900 AF Road Bike
description: Intensive training, sport cycling (all gradients and all distances). Bike designed for performance and endurance. A UCI certified frame that can be used to compete in all types of races

reviews.name: Elaine
reviews.comment: lightweight, but I wish it came with disc brakes

name: Van Rysel Road 500 Cycling Gloves
description: Cyclists cycling regularly in summer when it's warm and looking for light, thin gloves

reviews.name: George
reviews.comment: cheap but good. protected my hands from blisters

name: Van Rysel Road Cycling Gloves 500 Yellow
description: Cyclists cycling regularly in summer when it's warm and looking for light, thin gloves

reviews.name: George
reviews.comment: loved the black pair i got, so had to get another pair in yellow

name: Van Rysel RoadC 900 Road Cycling Gloves Blue
description: Our clothing design teams have developed these road bike gloves for all of your summer rides. They are very comfortable thanks to the padding on the palm.

reviews.name: Kramer
reviews.comment: only the fanciest gloves will do for me - hence this purchase
